programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.

programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.

programme.title: JAG: Recovery
programme.desc: A Navy astronaut dies during a drill while preparing for a space mission to repair a satellite.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt2
programme.desc: The main hanger of Doncaster Air Museum is a vast building and houses flying aircraft of every kind. Stuart ventures alone and soon realises something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P1
programme.desc: Said to be the Most Haunted prison in the UK, HMP Dorchester is a scary place to be with a group of people but alone it becomes terrifying. Karl investigates the upper cells and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P1
programme.desc: Said to be the Most Haunted prison in the UK, HMP Dorchester is a scary place to be with a group of people but alone it becomes terrifying. Karl investigates the upper cells and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P2
programme.desc: Stuart enters the underbelly of this remarkable building and starts to witness some very strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Walton Hall
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit a gem in the Cheshire countryside where a disembodied voice brings disarray to the investigation and something in the cellar fills Yvette with fear and dread.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Whittingdon Castle
programme.desc: The ghost of a drowned soldier awaits Yvette and her team of paranormal experts as they tackle the hauntings that plague this once magnificent castle.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Uninvited Guests
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been asked to help the 1875 Inn in Tilton, New Hampshire. The Inn has had two major fires, one of which supposedly took the life of a child named Laura, who now haunts the hotel.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Uninvited Guests
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been asked to help the 1875 Inn in Tilton, New Hampshire. The Inn has had two major fires, one of which supposedly took the life of a child named Laura, who now haunts the hotel.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.sub-title: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Scott Township, Pennsylvania to investigate the Pennsylvania Asylum and Testing Lab.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantoms of the Opera
programme.desc: On this special Halloween episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio to investigate the Cincinnati Music Hall, a buildingwhere the hauntingsare as frequent as the performances.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Last Will and Evidence
programme.desc: A bride-to-be has found her dream wedding venue....Burn Brae Mansion in Gley Spey, New York.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.3
programme.desc: A mother confesses to buying alcohol for underage teens who get drunk, throw rocks at cars and are ordered to pay $18,000 in restitution/Court fines for selling cigarettes to a minor are disputed by feuding sisters.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.184
programme.desc: Special laundry privileges after a divorce, followed by alleged\t\t\t\r\nstalking and assault charges, leave an ex-husband very angry about\t\t\t\r\nbeing arrested; he sues his ex for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.9
programme.desc: An Escalade rental for a group of partying teenagers ends in a lawsuit between a limo company and a frustrated mother who claims she was lied to by the owner.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.184
programme.desc: Special laundry privileges after a divorce, followed by alleged\t\t\t\r\nstalking and assault charges, leave an ex-husband very angry about\t\t\t\r\nbeing arrested; he sues his ex for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.75
programme.desc: Young man admits to being drunk and possessing marijuana but denies throwing rock through woman's window. Man cares for injured mother after father's death; fight over credit card debt and estate divides them.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.252
programme.desc: Attending a golf tournament becomes a source of contention between ex-lovers when payment for a plane ticket is challenged. When students move out of a shared apartment, their parents are left to fight over rent and damaged credit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.209
programme.desc:
A woman’s Chihuahua is killed by her neighbor’s larger dogs; she			
sues for damages.			
A teenager accuses her ex-boyfriend of trashing her New Year’s			
Eve party hotel room; she claims he was hitting on another woman.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.116
programme.desc: Claiming a female client was smoking marijuana, a personal trainer is sued by her father for allegedly skipping out on her sessions/A man allegedly locks his roommate out instead of properly evicting him after a dispute over bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.227
programme.desc: A lease agreement scrutiny challenges a woman's right to sue ex-tenants for property damage during a fight. A woman sues a former co-worker for loans to bail him out of jail and pay bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.81
programme.desc: Woman claims assault while trying to retrieve Glock 23 bought for boyfriend; ex-lover says gun was gift. Children accused of crashing into neighbor's parked vehicle while riding bikes in street.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.108
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-boyfriend of coercing money and housing with suicide threats/Teens dispute sale of stolen car in hit-and-run.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.97
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-roommate-to-be of stealing her security deposit; she is countersued for rent and money owed/A 21st birthday celebration ends with a young woman allegedly wrapping a borrowed car around a pole.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.sub-title: When the Wall Comes Tumbling Down
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts 18 more hopeful chefs through their paces. Will they impress by putting together their signature dishes in just 45 minutes?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.sub-title: When the Wall Comes Tumbling Down
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts 18 more hopeful chefs through their paces. Will they impress by putting together their signature dishes in just 45 minutes?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants race in the first annual Crepe Grand Prix challenge for the chance to win a luxurious dining experience.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Tensions run high as the teams are challenged to make eight unique dishes using a selection of ostrich cuts.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants compete in a surf and turf protein relay for the chance to win a day of surfing in San Diego.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge Gone Wrong
programme.desc: When Matt almost gets run down by a posse of graffiti-packing gangsters, he sets into motion a plan of revenge against Lyndah.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Warzone at the Worksite
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smut Campaign
programme.desc: After Ronnie suffers a near-fatal wound during an attack on the lot, he reconsiders his role in the repo business.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Warzone at the Worksite
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Vengeful Streak
programme.desc: Matt and Ronnie repo a Porsche from a maniac; Carlos and Ronnie come face to face during their repo of a cable van.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Roll the Dice
programme.desc: When Ronnie takes the fall for losing their previous repo, Carlos tries to make amends.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lou's Big Gamble
programme.desc: It's a brand new start for the Operation Repo team when Lou bets big on a high-risk opportunity and sets up shop in Las Vegas! But first, Ronnie and Froy must wrangle a wrestling ring from a Lucha Libre school.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: All In
programme.desc: The team is ahead of schedule on their Vegas mission, but will it all be derailed when Froy brings unwanted trouble back to the office? Also, Ronnie and Froy run into an unexpected dilemma when a husband's better halves take the reins.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Viva Las Vegas!
programme.desc: An Elvis impersonator gets Matt and Ronnie all shook up, and a ventriloquist's dummy has a nasty attitude that gets on Sonia's bad side. When Froy goes missing, Lou has to pick up the slack in a repo that goes terribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Big or Go Home
programme.desc: Fuming over Froy's departure, Matt loses his temper on a dominatrix and her client and packs his bags to return to LA.? Down two repo men, the pressure is on Ronnie and Carlos, who interrupts a couple in the middle of their less-than-holy matrimony.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Rider
programme.desc: What looks like a routine pick-up turns into a complicated case of betrayal, deceit, as well as quality nail care as Dog and company track down a fugitive alleged to be an abusive boyfriend with one too many friends in his close knit community.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Midnight Run
programme.desc: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.(n)

programme.title: Cyber Bride
programme.desc: After his wife tragically dies, a desperate widowed husband finds a service online that can bring her back - But not all is as it seems.

programme.title: Cyber Bride
programme.desc: After his wife tragically dies, a desperate widowed husband finds a service online that can bring her back - But not all is as it seems.

programme.title: Terra Formars
programme.desc: In an attempt to colonise Mars, 21st-century scientists seed the planet with algae to absorb sunlight and purify the atmosphere...(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Robin Williams, Al Pacino and Hilary Swank star in a thriller set in the land of the midnight sun, where the mind of even a tough cop can be threatened by Insomnia.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: Dead Zone
programme.desc: An elite team of soldiers who, to stop the collapse of humanity, descend on a radiation-poisoned town and perform the ultimate stealth mission using high-tech armor and weapons.

programme.title: Dead Zone

programme.title: Ninja: Shadow of a Tear
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Casey is back and out for revenge when his pregnant wife is murdered.(n)

programme.title: Defending Santa
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff finds a man asleep in the woods who claims to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: Defending Santa
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff finds a man asleep in the woods who claims to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Loves Music, Love To Dance
programme.desc: The personal ads of New York's trendiest magazines become the hunting ground for a bizarre killer whose calling card is a single, high heeled dancing shoe and one woman is determined to find out his true identity after the murder of her friend.(n)

programme.title: Full Exposure: The Sex Tapes Scandal
programme.desc: A high-priced call girl (Vanessa Williams) who has been secretly videotaping her rich clients is murdered.(n)

programme.title: Moviesphere
programme.desc: The MovieSphere Channel is serving up an endless stream of top-quality movies, from blockbuster hits to cult classics and everything in between.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy: Blood and Iron
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his fellow agents (Selma Blair, Doug Jones) encounter ghosts, monsters and a resurrected female vampire.(n)

programme.title: Horns
programme.desc: Blamed for the murder of his girlfriend, a man (Daniel Radcliffe) awakes one morning to find he has grown a pair of horns. Armed, now, with supernatural powers, he sets out to find the killer.(n)

programme.title: Gone With The West
programme.desc: After being framed, a cowboy is sent to jail. After his time is served, he leaves with vengeance in his heart. Soon he meets a young Native American woman and together they go to settle their score with a small town and its corrupt leader.

programme.title: Gone With The West
programme.desc: After being framed, a cowboy is sent to jail. After his time is served, he leaves with vengeance in his heart. Soon he meets a young Native American woman and together they go to settle their score with a small town and its corrupt leader.

programme.title: Gunfight in the Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging stranger guns down a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.(n)

programme.title: Ballad of Death Valley: Ballad of Death Valley
programme.desc: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fiancée of the local sheriff.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

programme.title: The Hippopotamus
programme.desc: Charming comedy based on the best-selling novel by Stephen Fry. A disgraced poet investigates a series of unexplained miracles.(n)

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: An author, convinced that cats are conspiring to replace the human race as masters of the earth, narrates three bizarre tales of feline terror.

programme.title: The Uncanny

programme.title: Act of Murder
programme.desc: An actor attempts to win his former mistress back by putting stress on her husband by poisoning their family dog, and the farm animals at their country place, simulating a robbery attempt.(n)

programme.title: The Arsenal Stadium Mystery
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector investigates the murder of amateur footballer during a charity soccer match against Arsenal at Highbury. Featuring Highbury itself with appearances from Arsenal manager George Allison and members of the team.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Speak Now
programme.desc: As a young couple is about to tie the knot, Johnny has a troubling vision of their future and must find a way to reveal what he sees.

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Speak Now
programme.desc: As a young couple is about to tie the knot, Johnny has a troubling vision of their future and must find a way to reveal what he sees.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Dead Woman's Shoes
programme.desc: Shy Maddie finds a pair of shoes and after trying them on is possessed by the vengeful spirit of a rich murdered woman.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Shadow Man/The Uncle Devil Show/Opening Day
programme.sub-title: The Shadow Man/The Uncle Devil Show/Opening Day
programme.desc: Boy finds solace in deal with Shadow Man/Video tricks bewilder parents/Lovers plot in Twilight Zone, facing ironic twist.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Beacon/One Life, Furnished in Early Poverty
programme.sub-title: The Beacon/One Life, Furnished in Early Poverty
programme.desc: Physician stranded in wary village/Gus Rosenthal revisits past, meets younger self. Guiding him, Gus realizes mistakes.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: After Hours/Lost and Found
programme.desc: Marsha Cole detects shadowy figures and mysterious voices around her during a trip to a local shopping mall/College student Jennifer Templeton finds out why her possessions have been vanishing.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 1
programme.desc: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 2
programme.desc: SCIU has surrounded the 5th Ward with troops and an electric shield that prevents them from leaving. Caleb has a virus that can turn the human population into abnormals. Magnus enacts her ultimate plan for the Sanctuary network.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)
